Name: Gamestop
Description: Shop GameStop, the world's largest retail gaming destination for Xbox One X, PlayStation 4 and Nintendo Switch games, systems, consoles & accessories. Shop a wide selection of gamer-centric apparel, collectibles & more.

Name: Target
Description: Shop Target online and in-store for everything from groceries and essentials to clothing and electronics. Choose contactless pickup or delivery today.

Name: Walmart
Description: Shop Walmart.com for Every Day Low Prices. Free Shipping on Orders $35+ or Pickup In-Store and get a Pickup Discount. Open a Walmart Credit Card to Save Even More!

Name: Newegg
Description: Newegg offers customers an awesome experience shopping for computers, hardware, electronics, networking solutions, and more. Upgrade your shopping experience today!

Name: Ebay
Description: Buy & sell electronics, cars, clothes, collectibles & more on eBay, the world's online marketplace. Top brands, low prices & free shipping on many items.

Name: Amazon
Description: Free delivery on millions of items with Prime. Low prices across earth's biggest selection of books, music, DVDs, electronics, computers, software, apparel & accessories, shoes, jewelry, tools & hardware, housewares, furniture, sporting goods, beauty & personal care, groceries & just about anything else.

Name: Microsoft Store
Description: At Microsoft our mission and values are to help people and businesses throughout the world realize their full potential.

Name: Nintendo Eshop
Description: Browse and buy digital games on the Nintendo game store, and automatically download them to your Nintendo Switch, Nintendo 3DS system or Wii U console.

Name: Steam
Description: Steam is the ultimate destination for playing, discussing, and creating games.

Name: GOG
Description: Download the best classic and new games on Windows, Mac & Linux. A vast selection of titles, DRM-free, with free goodies and 30-day money-back guarantee.

Name: Epic Games Store
Description: A curated digital storefront for PC and Mac, designed with both players and creators in mind.

Name: Humble Bundle
Description: Pay what you want. Support charity. Get awesome games.

Name: GeForce NOW
Description: Instantly play the most demanding PC games and seamlessly play across your devices.

Name: Fishing Cactus
Description: Fishing Cactus is a game development studios based in Belgium. Our mantra? Crafting smart video games with soul! Our team combines 30 years of experience in PC, consoles and mobile game development. We work on our own IPs and do work for hire.

Name: Itch
Description: itch.io is a simple way to find, download and distribute indie games online. Whether you're a developer looking to upload your game or just someone looking for something new to play itch.io has you covered.

Name: Uplay
Description: Connect with Ubisoft players, enjoy Rewards and discounts, compare your stats with your friends and much more in Ubisoft Connect.

Name: Battle.net
Description: Download the Battle.net Desktop App, your gateway to all things Blizzard.

Name: Facebook Games
Description: Facebook Instant Games, Web Games, and Gameroom

Description: Miniclip is the world's largest independent online games site with over 600 games. The site is updated at least twice a week...so you can get your gaming fix whenever you want it.

Name: Plug In Digital
Description: Plug In Digital is one of the largest independent video game distributors. We help studios & publishers distributing their games on PC, consoles and mobile. Porting, distribution, manufacturing services major markets, including Brazil, China, and Russia.

Name: UCC Distributing
Description: Toys

Description: Limited Run Games is a publisher and distributor of strictly limited PlayStation 4, Vita, and Nintendo Switch games. Physical Copies and Merchandise of Indie Games.

Name: Signature Edition Games
Description: Signature Edition Games brings physical indie games for collectors. Signature Editions contain a region-free version of the game plus a host of additional content that is super collectable. Signature Edition offers premium packaging, fast and affordable shipping, friendly and efficient customer service.

Name: 1st Press Games
Description: Physical high quality releases of video games and soundtracks. For Playstation 4, Nintendo Switch and PC.

Description: Playism specializes in localizing and publishing indie games from all over the globe, bringing the best indie games that Japan, America and the rest of the world have to offer.

Name: WinGameStore
